title: Business & Finance
text:
China imposed a fine equivalent to $2.8 billion against Alibaba for abusing its dominant position over rivals and merchants on its e-commerce platforms.

---

U.S. airlines removed dozens of newly built 737 MAX jets from service after Boeing flagged a potential electrical problem.

---

Saudi Arabia's Aramco said it struck a $12.4 billion deal to sell a 49% stake in a newly formed oil pipeline business to an international consortium.

---

The Dow and S&P 500 rose 0.9% and 0.8%, respectively, to close at records, while the Nasdaq added 0.5%. All three indexes posted gains for the week.

---

McDonald's is closing hundreds of restaurants located in Walmart stores.
